name: ♥girl things♥
description:
♥girl things♥ is a game about you, a trans wlw, and your friend lily being able to finally hang out & spend time together. 

cw: mentions of dysphoria and parental unacceptance

♥gt♥ is supposed to be a small, feel good story to play whenever you want a tiny pick-me-up! it was made using twine, and is my first serious project; please tell me if you find any typos or other little goof-ups!

thanks for reading!! love you!!

[[included in the download is the HTML file  and all images used in ♥girl things♥. when playing, please extract all contents into a folder, and play the file in your browser of choice. again, thanks!!]]
